nodes.title: Sampler YAML
widgets_values:
verbose: false
step_random_mode: block
step_size: 5
first_ancestral_step: 14
last_ancestral_step: 34
enable_clamp_output: false
start_sigma_index: 0
end_sigma_index: -1
blend_mode: lerp
step_blend_mode: lerp
fbg_config:
  sampler_mode: EULER
  cfg_scale: 7.0
  cfg_start_sigma: 1.0
  cfg_end_sigma: 0.004
  fbg_start_sigma: 1.0
  fbg_end_sigma: 0.006
  max_guidance_scale: 15.0
  initial_guidance_scale: 1.0
  guidance_max_change: 0.5
  pi: 0.5
  t_0: 0.5
  t_1: 0.4
fbg_eta: 0.0
fbg_s_noise: 1.0
debug_mode: true

nodes.title: Lyrics
widgets_values:
[Verse 1]
Empty bottles line the kitchen floor
Like memories we can't ignore
You're calling me but I won't pick up
When you left me standing there with a cup

[Bridge]
The pictures on your phone, all faded now
Your smile is something I don't know how to find somehow
I thought we were forever, that's what you said before
But now the laughter's gone, just echoes of what was there

[Chorus]
Just another chapter in our storybook
You're flipping pages that I can't fix or rework
The walls around my heart are crumbling fast
As you fade away and leave me in this place, at last

[Verse 2]
Your voice mails pile up on the phone
Each one a ghost of what's been blown
Away by time, like autumn leaves
In memories that can't be retrieved

[Bridge]
I'm trying to hold onto pieces here
Of someone I used to know so near
But every day it gets harder still
To feel anything at all when I feel this chill

[Chorus]
Just another chapter in our storybook
You're flipping pages that I can't fix or rework
The walls around my heart are crumbling fast
As you fade away and leave me in this place, at last

nodes.title: ReadMe!
widgets_values:
https://github.com/MDMAchine/ComfyUI_MD_Nodes

If you dont have ollama for LLM disable or delete Scene Genuis Autocreator node.

Instruct models perform the best usually.

ACE-Step GGUF Models:
https://huggingface.co/calcuis/ace-gguf

ACE-Step HF:
https://huggingface.co/ACE-Step/ACE-Step-v1-3.5B

verbose: true

rules:
  - start_sigma: -1
    apg_scale: 0
    cfg: 4

  - start_sigma: 0.85
    apg_scale: 5.0
    predict_image: true
    cfg: 4
    mode: pre_alt2
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-2, -1]
    momentum: 0.7
    norm_threshold: 3.0
    eta: 0.0

  - start_sigma: 0.70
    apg_scale: 4.5
    predict_image: true
    cfg: 3.9
    mode: pre_alt2
    update_blend_mode: lerp
    dims: [-2, -1]
    momentum: 0.6
    norm_threshold: 2.5
    eta: 0.0

  - start_sigma: 0.55
    apg_scale: 4
    predict_image: true
    cfg: 3.8
    mode: pure_apg
    momentum: 0.0

  - start_sigma: 0.40
    apg_scale: 3.8
    predict_image: false
    cfg: 3.7
    momentum: 0.0

  - start_sigma: 0.30
    apg_scale: 3.5
    predict_image: false
    cfg: 3.6
    momentum: 0.0

  - start_sigma: 0.15
    apg_scale: 0
    cfg: 3.5
    momentum: 0.0

nodes.title: APG YAML
widgets_values:
verbose: true
rules:
- start_sigma: -1
  apg_scale: 0
  cfg: 4.5
  predict_image: false
  mode: pure_apg
  update_blend_mode: lerp
  eta: 0.0
- start_sigma: 0.85
  apg_scale: 5.0
  cfg: 4.2
  predict_image: true
  mode: pre_alt2
  update_blend_mode: lerp
  dims: [-2, -1]
  momentum: 0.7
  norm_threshold: 3.0
  eta: 0.0
- start_sigma: 0.65
  apg_scale: 4.0
  cfg: 4.0
  predict_image: true
  mode: pre_alt2
  update_blend_mode: lerp
  dims: [-2, -1]
  momentum: 0.6
  norm_threshold: 2.5
  eta: 0.0
- start_sigma: 0.45
  apg_scale: 3.0
  cfg: 3.8
  predict_image: true
  mode: pure_apg
  momentum: 0.0
- start_sigma: 0.25
  apg_scale: 1.5
  cfg: 3.7
  predict_image: false
  momentum: 0.0
- start_sigma: 0.05
  apg_scale: 0.0
  cfg: 3.5

# Usable YAML settings for PingPong Sampler (Custom V0.9.9 FBG)

# --- PingPong Sampler Specific Parameters ---
# These parameters directly map to the top-level inputs of the node.
step_random_mode: "block" # Example: Change to "off", "block", "reset", or "step"
step_size: 4
seed: 12345 # Your desired seed
start_sigma_index: 0
end_sigma_index: -1
enable_clamp_output: false
blend_mode: "lerp"
step_blend_mode: "lerp"

# --- Nested PingPong Options ---
# Parameters that belong to the 'pingpong_options' dictionary.
pingpong_options:
  first_ancestral_step: 15
  last_ancestral_step: 35

# --- Feedback Guidance (FBG) Specific Parameters ---
# These parameters are for the 'fbg_config' dictionary.
# IMPORTANT: Use the internal FBGConfig field names (e.g., 'sampler_mode', 'temp', 'offset'),
# not the node input names (e.g., 'fbg_sampler_mode', 'fbg_temp', 'fbg_offset').
# The code now handles the remapping if you use the node input names in YAML,
# but using the correct FBGConfig names is best practice.
fbg_config:
  sampler_mode: "EULER" # Correct: 'sampler_mode', not 'fbg_sampler_mode'
  cfg_scale: 7.0 # Example: Change base CFG scale
  cfg_start_sigma: 1.0 # Adjusted to common model starting sigma
  cfg_end_sigma: 0.004 # Adjusted to common model ending sigma
  fbg_start_sigma: 1.0 # Adjusted to common model starting sigma
  fbg_end_sigma: 0.006 # Retaining your specific FBG end sigma
  ancestral_start_sigma: 1.0 # Adjusted to common model starting sigma
  ancestral_end_sigma: 0.004 # Adjusted to common model ending sigma
  max_guidance_scale: 15.0 # Example: Higher max guidance
  initial_guidance_scale: 1.0
  guidance_max_change: 0.5 # Example: Limit guidance change to 50% per step
  pi: 0.5 # Example: Adjust pi for T2I (often lower than 0.95)
  t_0: 0.5
  t_1: 0.4
  temp: 0.0 # Will be auto-calculated if t_0/t_1 are non-zero. If you set t_0/t_1 to 0, this value will be used.
  offset: 0.0 # Will be auto-calculated if t_0/t_1 are non-zero. If you set t_0/t_1 to 0, this value will be used.
  log_posterior_initial_value: 0.0
  fbg_guidance_multiplier: 1.0

# --- Top-level FBG specific parameters ---
# These are outside the 'fbg_config' block.
fbg_eta: 0.0
fbg_s_noise: 1.0

# --- Debug Mode ---
debug_mode: true # Set to 'true' or 'false' to enable/disable console logging for debugging.

[Verse 1]
Ghost in my phone, your name's still there,
A fleeting ghost, without a care.
In hollow spaces, echoes remain,
From love that lost its shape.

[Chorus]
Lost in the haze of our broken past,
Tossed aside, like a moment not to last,
You left no mark, just an empty space,
Where we once shared a fragile place.

[Verse 2]
Fading light on a city's endless floor,
We stood as one, yet never more.
Synthetic love, in a digital haze,
A mirage that vanished with the days.

[Chorus]
Lost in the haze of our broken past,
Tossed aside, like a moment not to last,
You left no mark, just an empty space,
Where we once shared a fragile place.
a adult song about being in a relationship and not being valued, and tossed aside.
